title: D+D=T
author: saku
proposedTheory: The halfman is the Stallion who Mounts the World. Mirri Maz Duur created a rift in spacetime to do a fetus-swap, making Rhaego and Tyrion the same person, and creating a prophecy where he becomes destined to marry Dany, his mother.

title: 3ER needs to die
author: noggin
proposedTheory: Bran is a vessel for the three-eyed raven and is too powerful to survive

title: Tyrion turns on Dany
author: noggin
proposedTheory: Tyrion betrays Dany for the "greater good" not because Cersei.

title: Gendry kills a dragon
author: saku
proposedTheory: Gendry Thor-hammers a dragon (Viserion) from a forged dragon glass hammer

title: Cersei the kidnapper
author: saku
proposedTheory: Cersei kidnaps Tyrion and/or Sansa while everyone is focused on the north. Causing forces to be split from the main attack (against NK + WW)

title: Tyrion triggers Clegane Bowl
author: saku
proposedTheory: Sansa kidnapped by Cersei forces Tyrion to demand trial by combat with dondarian/the hound to fight the mountain.
